question: How can I make a traditional French Ratatouille and generate an image of the dish?

steps.content: How can I make a traditional French Ratatouille and generate an image of the dish?
Plan: 1) Search for a traditional French Ratatouille recipe. 2) Generate an image of Ratatouille. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for a traditional French Ratatouille recipe.
Traditional French Ratatouille recipe: 1 eggplant, 1 zucchini, 1 bell pepper, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1/4 cup olive oil, salt, pepper, and herbs de Provence.
What is the best way to serve Ratatouille?
Plan: 1) Search for serving suggestions for Ratatouille. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for serving suggestions for Ratatouille.
Ratatouille is best served warm or at room temperature, often accompanied by crusty bread or as a side dish to grilled meats.
